full_text:
Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
From
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
To
Lee Plourde (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) NYM/Exec Assistant~ NYM/Exec
Date
2019/08/10 19:14
Subject:
Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
Attachments:
TEXT.htm
Thanks Lee, I just forwarded it to my bosses for their awareness.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: NYM/Exec Assistant~ <NYM/ExecAssistant~@bop.gov>
Date: 8/10/19 6:51 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) pbop.gov> (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Fwd: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death
>>> "NYM/Exec Assistant~" 08/10/2019 18:51 >>>
(b)(7)(E)
Thank you
Lee
>> (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @buzzfeed.com> 8/10/2019 6:03 PM >>>
Hello,
I'm a reporter with BuzzFeed News. I'm reaching out because we suspect one of the paramedics involved in responding the Jeffrey Epstein call posted information online before it was reported in the mainstream media.
We were able to view posts on the website 4chan, frequented by far-right trolls, that were published a full 45 minutes before ABC news first reported Epstein's death. I'd like to send you the posts to verify whether the information in them is correct and whether it could have come to your team but in addition to that, do you have any statement on the situation?
Thank you,
(b)(6)
(b)(7)(C)
--
(b)(6) (b)(7)(C)
Reporter | BuzzFeed News
PGP | Signal, WhatsApp, Telegram, Cell: +1 (613) 276 (b)(6)
(b)(7)(C)
Send anonymous tip: contact.buzzfeed.com
Page 4357
DOJ-OGR-00024366

text_blocks.content: Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death

From (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) To Lee Plourde (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) NYM/Exec Assistant~ NYM/Exec Date 2019/08/10 19:14 Subject: Re: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death Attachments: TEXT.htm
Thanks Lee, I just forwarded it to my bosses for their awareness.

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone ------- Original message ------- From: NYM/Exec Assistant~ <NYM/ExecAssistant~@bop.gov> Date: 8/10/19 6:51 PM (GMT-05:00) To: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) pbop.gov> (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> Subject: Fwd: Urgent request -- Potential leak in hospital regarding Epstein's death >>> "NYM/Exec Assistant~" 08/10/2019 18:51 >>> (b)(7)(E) Thank you Lee

>> (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) @buzzfeed.com> 8/10/2019 6:03 PM >>> Hello, I'm a reporter with BuzzFeed News. I'm reaching out because we suspect one of the paramedics involved in responding the Jeffrey Epstein call posted information online before it was reported in the mainstream media.

We were able to view posts on the website 4chan, frequented by far-right trolls, that were published a full 45 minutes before ABC news first reported Epstein's death. I'd like to send you the posts to verify whether the information in them is correct and whether it could have come to your team but in addition to that, do you have any statement on the situation?
Thank you, (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) -- (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Reporter | BuzzFeed News PGP | Signal, WhatsApp, Telegram, Cell: +1 (613) 276 (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) Send anonymous tip: contact.buzzfeed.com

additional_notes: The document is an email chain regarding a potential leak in a hospital related to Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email contains redactions, likely for privacy or security reasons.
